Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26thbuses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park and 26th: due to, street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26thbuses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park and 26th: due to, street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Ridgeland/Chicago
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Augusta, Oak Park, Chicago & Ridgeland, due to street blockage near Ridgeland/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Augusta, Oak Park, Chicago, then resume their normal route on Ridgeland, due to street blockage near Ridgeland/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
